name: victory-star

effect.black_white: All friendly Pokémon's moves, including this Pokémon's own moves, have 1.1× their usual accuracy while this Pokémon is in battle.
effect.black_2_white_2: All friendly Pokémon's moves, including this Pokémon's own moves, have 1.1× their usual accuracy while this Pokémon is in battle.

short_effect: Increases moves' accuracy to 1.1× for friendly Pokémon.

flavor_text.black_white: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself.
